metadata.name: AREEIRO
metadata.description:
"Areeiro"

This piece reminds me not to get discouraged. 
Even if not everything goes according to plan, just keep going and be creative.

This morning my plan was to take photos of this place with the drone. 
Suddenly, a few minutes after taking off the drone fell from the sky and crashed on a steep slope. 
I was paralyzed for a few seconds and didn't know what to do. But one thing was certain. I had to save the memory card.  
I put my life in danger and climbed down the gravel slope. Just a bit further and it would have fallen hundreds of meters into the valley.  
As if that hadn't happened, I improvised and looked for another nice angle to shoot with my full frame camera.  
All in all I was really lucky. I was able to rescue the drone and the memory card, happily it was the last day of the trip and all drone shots were taken and I took a photo of this place which is more unique.


Location: Madeira, Portugal  
Year: 2020

Editions of 30
